name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and cloud integration. Adept at developing robust **APIs** and leveraging **AWS** to create scalable **SaaS** and **PaaS** solutions. Proficient in modern frameworks and libraries including **React**, **Vue**, and **Next.js**, applying principles of responsive design using **HTML5** and **Bootstrap**. Experienced in building asynchronous applications utilizing **WebSockets** and **REST**. 

Demonstrated expertise in deploying CI/CD pipelines and implementing microservices architectures to improve agility. Strong capabilities in problem-solving and time management, ensuring timely project delivery while maintaining high-quality standards. Well-versed in compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring that applications meet industry regulations. Effective communicator with a knack for aligning technical discussions with stakeholder needs.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed full-stack solutions leveraging **Node.js**, **JavaScript**, and **HTML5**, ensuring robust APIs for seamless integration with various **cloud** services such as **AWS** and **Heroku**.
- Created high-performance web applications utilizing **REST** and **SOAP** protocols, enhancing real-time data communication via **WebSockets** and **AJAX** methodologies.
- Implemented scalable **SaaS** and **PaaS** architectures, optimizing resource management for a broad range of applications, adhering to industry standards.
- Collaborated on cross-functional teams, enhancing communication and problem-solving skills to deliver time-sensitive projects within an average timeline of **3 months**.
- Built and managed server-side applications, resulting in a **40%** increase in uptime and reliability across services supported by **Linux/Unix** environments.
- Designed educational tools integrating **Genesys**, **Avaya**, and **Cisco** platforms to streamline customer interactions, thus improving the response time by **25%**.
- Enhanced user interfaces through frameworks like **Bootstrap**, **jQuery**, and **Backbone.js**, improving user engagement metrics by **15%** based on A/B testing.
- Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** for automated testing and deployment, cutting down deployment time from days to **hours**.
- Analyzed system performance metrics to identify bottlenecks and implement strategic upgrades, significantly improving system response times.
- Spearheaded the integration of third-party tools such as **Salesforce**, **MS Dynamics**, and **Zendesk** into existing workflows, enhancing customer experience and data sharing capabilities.

• Developed robust APIs and microservices using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), facilitating seamless data integration and service interoperability.
• Designed and implemented responsive, user-focused front-end applications by leveraging **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, while applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for optimal user experiences.
• Engineered real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enhancing decision-making capabilities with a 99% uptime for transaction monitoring.
• Built and managed an event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring reliable asynchronous communication across **5** critical workflows such as payments and compliance.
• Created ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** to process financial data from **10+** internal and third-party sources, supporting both batch and real-time scenarios with enhanced data accuracy.
• Developed and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection with **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, improving fraud detection rates by **30%** through analysis of transactional behavior.
• Implemented ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification by integrating **MLflow** and **Airflow**, improving prediction accuracy with reduced processing time by **25%**.

• Developed robust **APIs** and backend services using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) and **JavaScript** for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
• Integrated **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by platforms like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to engineer real-time customer updates and inventory tracking, enhancing user engagement significantly.
• Designed responsive and SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs utilizing **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **JavaScript** frameworks including **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, optimized for mobile-first engagement.
• Leveraged **AWS** cloud services for scalable deployment of applications and utilized **SaaS** and **PaaS** solutions for enhanced performance and reliability.
• Applied **REST** principles to create seamless communication between frontend and backend, ensuring efficiency and ease of integration within the existing systems.
• Implemented Redis caching for product metadata, improving response times by over **50%** in high-traffic scenarios.
• Employed feature flags and blue-green deployment strategies using **Kubernetes** and **LaunchDarkly** to control product rollouts and minimize risks during updates.
• Developed secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay** while ensuring **PCI-compliance** in handling sensitive user data.
• Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** protocols to protect user data and enforce **GDPR compliance**, securing access for both customer and admin interfaces.
• Problem-solved and managed time efficiently to meet development deadlines, effectively communicating project status to stakeholders.
